name: multi_candidate_perturbation
hypothesis: Current perturbation only explores around best candidate. 2nd-best candidate may be in a different basin with better local optimum.

planned_configs.description: Perturb top 2 with 1 perturbation each (2 total)
Perturb top 2 with 2 perturbations each (4 total)
planned_configs.rationale: More exploration if Run 1 shows promise

planned_configs.description: Perturb only top 1 with 2 perturbations (baseline comparison)
planned_configs.rationale: Direct comparison to understand if 2nd candidate helps

conclusions.finding: Score +0.0058 better than baseline (1.1526 vs 1.1468). 2nd-best candidate perturbation shows promise.
conclusions.limitation: Machine too slow - 150.4 min vs 60 min budget (2.5x over). Cannot validate production viability.
conclusions.comparison: Multi-candidate perturbation outperforms multi-seed (1.1526 vs 1.1162). Sample 7 improved from 0.5374 to 0.3242.
conclusions.recommendation: Test on faster machine. If budget permits, perturbing 2nd-best candidate may improve accuracy.
